results.description: Farmers is New Zealand's leading-edge department store and represents some of the highest profile brands in the market alongside our well known house brands We are a business that is rich in tradition but ready to adapt and evolve with the ever changing retail landscape Farmers have an eye to the future and continue to build brand loyalty with an increasing customer base. We are seeking a Buying Manager to lead our Menswear team. If you are interested, you must be adaptable, hungry, motivated a…
results.title: Menswear Buying Manager

results.description: Working for Countdown isn't just about in-store opportunities. We're at the cutting edge of retail innovation, and this is supported by a reputable Manufacturing, Logistics and Corporate division including Construction, Property Management, Legal, IT, Finance, HR, Customer Service, Buying and Marketing. x For more information about Countdown careers, visit http://www.countdown.co.nz/about-us/careers
